msbt.message: Hey, ! There's someone sayin' they need something from you.You're hanging out with a friend right now, yeah? No biggie. It can wait for a bit, .Just make sure you come by later today, OK?

Oh hey, ! You're hanging out with right now, yeah?Can you tell 'em something for me, ?So, there's someone who REALLY wants to talk to them. Like, today.But they ALSO don't wanna interrupt 's hang out time. Anyway, it seemed important.Can you tell to swing by later today after you're done? You rock, !
